meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These rules may be cited as the Small Claims Tribunal (Forms) Rules.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Forms
section.content: The forms contained in the Schedule shall be used in the tribunal with such variations as the circumstances may require.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.text: Form 1Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)TITLE TO CLAIM: GENERAL FORM

tr.td: Claim No. of 19 .
Claimant(s)
and
Defendant(s)

td.p: Insert full name and address of each claimant and, in the case of a representative claim, the name and address of each person represented.
Insert full name and address of each defendant.

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)FORM OF CLAIM[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: The claimant claims the amount of.particulars of the grounds for which and the manner in which it is calculated are set out as follows:

td.p: The grounds for the claim are:
The amount of claim is calculated as follows:

tr.td: Dated this.day of.19.
Filed this.day of.19.
Set out sufficient particulars to inform the defendant of the grounds for the claim.
Set out in full the manner in which the amount of claim is calculated and whether it includes any interest or expenses.
This claim must be signed by each claimant or person represented before the date of hearing.

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF PLACE AND DAY FIXED FOR HEARING[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: Take Notice that this claim has been made by the claimant against you and will be heard at a tribunal to be held at..before.Adjudicator, on the.day of.19., at.*a.m./p.m.

And Take Notice that if you do not attend at the time and place mentioned, either in person or by a person authorized by the tribunal to appear on your behalf, the claim may be heard in your absence and such award or order may be made in your absence as the tribunal thinks fit.
Dated this.day of.19.
(a) This notice and a copy of the claim was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of .19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of claim and notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.

td.p: Service shall be effected in accordance with section 14(2) of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance.

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF NEW PLACE AND NEW DAY FIXED FOR HEARING[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: Take Notice that this claim will be heard at.on the.day of.19., at . *a.m./p.m. and any previous notice of the place and date of hearing is hereby cancelled.
Dated this.day of.19.
(a) This notice was served by me on.
.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.

td.p: Service shall be effected in accordance with section 14(2) of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance.

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)SUMMONS TO WITNESS[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: To (a)
YOU ARE HEREBY SUMMONED to attend at.
.on.the.day
of.19.at.o’clock, and so from day to day,
until the proceedings are heard, to give evidence in the above claim *and
also bring with you and produce the several documents hereunder specified:
[Here insert list of documents required to be produced.]

In default of your attendance you will be liable for forfeit a fine not exceeding level 2 if there was paid or tendered to you at the time of service of this summons a reasonable sum in respect of your expenses including any loss of salary or wages.
Dated this.day of.19.
Sum to be paid or tendered to witness $
This summons was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of summons if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete if witness not required to produce documents.

td.p: Insert name of person to be served.
Service to be effected in accordance with the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)FORM OF *AWARD/ORDER[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: IT IS ADJUDGED that (a) .obtained against (b) .the following *award/order.
Dated this.day of .19.
Insert full name of the party in whose favour the award or order is made.
Insert full name of the party against whom the award or order is made.
An application in Form 8C for review of an award or order must be made to the Adjudicator within 7 days after the date of the award or order.
An application in Form 8D to set aside an award or order must be made to the tribunal within 7 days after the hearing.
An application in Form 9 for leave to appeal against an award or order must be lodged with the Registrar, High Court, within—
7 days after the date on which the written award or order is served on the aggrieved party; or
if within that period the aggrieved party applies to the tribunal for the reasons for the award or order, 7 days after the date on which the reasons are served on him.

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)APPLICATION FOR REVIEW BY THE COURT OF FIRST INSTANCE OF TRIBUNAL’S DECISION TO TRANSFER A CLAIM[title as in Form 1]

td.p: To The Court of First Instance.

tr.td: I, (a) ., a party to this claim, pursuant to section 27 of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance, do hereby make application for a review of the tribunal’s decision made on the.day of.19.to transfer this claim to the *Minor Employment Claims Adjudication Board/Labour Tribunal/Lands Tribunal/District Court/Court of First Instance.
(b) Dated this.day of.19.
* Delete whichever is not applicable.
Insert full name of the party making application.
An application for a review of the tribunal’s decision to transfer a claim must be made within 7 days of the decision.

schedule.text:
Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF REVIEW BY THE COURT OF FIRST INSTANCE ON THE
APPLICATION OF A PARTY[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: An Application has been made by (a) .a party to this claim, for a review under section 27 of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance of the tribunal’s decision made on the.day of.19.to transfer this claim to the *Minor Employment Claims Adjudication Board/Labour Tribunal/Lands Tribunal/District Court/Court of First Instance.
Take Notice that the Court of First Instance will review the decision at.on the.day of.19.at.*a.m./p.m.
Dated this .day of.19.
(b) This notice was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).
Insert full name of the party by whom the application has been made.
Service shall be effected in the manner prescribed under the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).

schedule.text:
Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF REVIEW BY AN ADJUDICATOR
OF HIS OWN MOTION[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: TAKE NOTICE that in exercise of the powers conferred by section 27A(1) of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance, ..Adjudicator, will review the *award/order made on the.day of.19.against (a) .*claimant(s)/defendant(s) to this claim.
AND TAKE NOTICE that the review will be heard at.
.on the.day of.19.
at.*a.m./p.m.
Dated this.day of.19.
(b) This notice was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.
Insert full name and address of party against whom award/order was made.
Service shall be effected in the manner prescribed under the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).

schedule.text:
Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF REVIEW BY AN ADJUDICATOR ON
THE APPLICATION OF A PARTY[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: An Application has been made by (a) ., a party to this claim, for a review under section 27A of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance of an *award/order made on the.day of.19.in respect of this claim.
TAKE NOTICE that., Adjudicator will review the *award/order at.on the.day of.19.at.*a.m./p.m.
Dated this.day of.19.
(b) This notice was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.
Insert full name of the party by whom the application has been made.
Service shall be effected in the manner prescribed under the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).

schedule.text:
Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)APPLICATION FOR REVIEW OF AN *AWARD/ORDER
BY A PARTY[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: I, (a) ., a party to this claim which was heard and determined before you on the.day of.19., being dissatisfied with the *award/order made by you in respect of this claim, hereby, pursuant to section 27A(2)(b) of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance, make application to you to review the *award/order.
(b) Dated this.day of.19 .
* Delete whichever is not applicable.

td.p: Insert full name of the party making application.
An application for a review of an award or order must be made within 7 days after the date of the award or order.

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)APPLICATION TO SET ASIDE AN *AWARD/ORDER[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: I, (a) ., a party to this claim, which was heard and determined by the tribunal in my absence and an *award/order made on the.day of.19., hereby, pursuant to section 32A of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance, make application to set aside the *award/order.
The *reason/reasons for my non-appearance at the hearing *is/are.
(b) Dated this.day of.19.
* Delete whichever is not applicable.
Insert full name of the party making application.
This application must be made to the tribunal within 7 days after the hearing.

schedule.text:
Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF DAY FIXED FOR HEARING OF AN APPLICATION
TO SET ASIDE AN *AWARD/ORDER[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: An Application has been made by (a)., a party to this claim, to set aside under section 32A of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance the *award/order made in the absence of the applicant on the.day of.19. in respect of this claim. The reasons for the non-appearance of the applicant are set out in the Application, a copy of which is annexed hereto.
TAKE NOTICE that the Application will be heard at.on the.day of.19.at.*a.m./p.m.
Dated this.day of.19.
(b) This notice was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.
Insert full name of the party by whom the application has been made.
Service shall be effected in the manner prescribed under the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)APPLICATION FOR LEAVE TO APPEAL ON POINT OF LAW[title as in Form 1]

td.p: To The Court of First Instance.

tr.td: I, (a)., a party to this claim, pursuant to section 28 of the Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance do hereby apply for leave to appeal against the *award/order by.., Adjudicator, made in respect of this claim on the.day of.19.
The grounds on which I desire to appeal are that—
*the *award/order is erroneous in point of law in that—(b)
*the *award/order is outside the jurisdiction of the tribunal in that—(c)
Dated this.day of.19.
(d) Lodged this.day of.19.
* Delete whichever is not applicable.

td.p: Insert full name of the party making the application for leave to appeal.
Set out the point of law in question.
This application must be lodged with the Registrar, High Court, within—
7 days after the date on which the written award or order is served on the party making this application; or
if within that period the party applies to the tribunal for the award or order, 7 days after the date on which the reasons are served on him.

schedule.text:
Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF DAY FIXED FOR HEARING OF AN APPLICATION
FOR LEAVE TO APPEAL[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: Take Notice that your application dated.19.for leave to appeal against the *award/order of.., Adjudicator, made on the.day of.19.in respect of this claim will be heard at.on the.day of.19.at.
Dated this.day of.19.
(a) This notice was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.

td.p: Service to be effected in accordance with the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).

schedule.text: Small Claims Tribunal Ordinance(Chapter 338)NOTICE OF DAY FIXED FOR HEARING OF AN APPEALIn the Court of First Instance[title as in Form 1]

tr.td: Take Notice that leave to appeal against the *award/order of., Adjudicator, made on the.day of.19.in respect of this claim has been granted. The grounds of appeal are set out in the application for leave to appeal, a copy of which is annexed hereto.
And Take Notice that this appeal will be heard at.on the .day of.19.at.
Dated this.day of.19.
(a) This notice was served by me on.by means of.on the.day of.19.

td.p: (Signature of recipient of notice if obtained).

tr.td: * Delete whichever is not applicable.

td.p: Service to be effected in accordance with the Small Claims Tribunal (General) Rules (Cap. 338 sub. leg. A).
